titles.title: Kimi to Boku no Hole Share
君と僕のホールシェア

data.title: Kimi to Boku no Hole Share
data.title_japanese: 君と僕のホールシェア
data.synopsis:
Madoka Hayashi's life hasn't turned out the way he had hoped, with his hobby of needle felting being his only respite from the stress of being overworked at an unfulfilling office job. However, everything changes when Tamaki, a woman who lives in the room next door, accidentally punches a hole in their wall.

[Written by Denji]

titles.title: Sore wa Marude Amagasa no You ni
それはまるで雨傘のように

data.title: Sore wa Marude Amagasa no You ni
data.title_japanese: それはまるで雨傘のように
data.synopsis:
Cheering on her friend's crush, using abusive language towards the homeroom teacher. Yayoi's fun school life changes greatly after one incident. The one who saved Yayoi, who was deeply hurt, was her homeroom teacher, Tsuzuki-sensei. The forbidden love between a teacher and a lonely high school girl!

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
data.background: Sore wa Marude Amagasa no You ni is an adaptation of Rii's web novel of the same title.

titles.title: At the Harem With the Sheik
シーク様とハーレムで。
With the Sheikh in His Harem

data.title: Sheik-sama to Harem de.
data.title_english: With the Sheikh in His Harem
data.title_japanese: シーク様とハーレムで。
title_synonyms: At the Harem With the Sheik
data.synopsis:
Sanagi loves nothing more than money—not even love. After all, it's what keeps her small family going. But when a chance encounter with a stranger leads her to push away his offer of riches, she wonders if she's gone crazy...and starts to believe she really has when he reveals that he's a Sheikh, and proposes to her! She rejects him, but soon finds out that a marriage with him might be the only way to keep her family safe...!

(Source: Kodansha USA)

Included one-shot:
Volume 8: Darling wa My Fiancée
data.background: Sheik-sama to Harem de. was published digitally in English as With the Sheikh in His Harem by Kodansha USA from May 4, 2021 to December 7, 2021.

titles.title: 嫌いになります、佐山くん！

data.title: Kirai ni Narimasu, Sayama-kun!
data.title_japanese: 嫌いになります、佐山くん！
data.synopsis:
The student council president, Wakana Ayukawa, has someone on her mind. That someone is her junior in the student council, Sayama-kun!

One day, Wakana daringly confesses to Sayama-kun, but her confession is returned with an overwhelmingly difficult "dating condition"...?! How will Wakana's one-sided love unfold—?! A popular artist's work, a troublesome pure love-comedy. Let the show begin!

(Source: Kodansha, translated)

titles.title: Sasayaku You ni Koi wo Utau
ささやくように恋を唄う

data.title: Sasayaku You ni Koi wo Utau
data.title_japanese: ささやくように恋を唄う
data.synopsis:
Yori Asanagi is a mature girl in many ways but is still pure when it comes to romance. That sentiment is proven when an underclassman, Himari Kino, suddenly confesses love to her after her band performance at the freshman opening ceremony.

Confused and surprised, Yori asks her friends for consultation, but they tease her by saying that she is experiencing love. Yori soon makes up her mind and tries to return Himari's feelings, but in a twist of events, she realizes that what Himari loved was not her, but her music!

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
data.background: Sasayaku You ni Koi wo Utau has been published in English as Whisper Me a Love Song by Kodansha USA since October 20, 2020. It has also been released in Polish as Cicha piosenka o miłości by Studio JG since January 1, 2020.

titles.title: 割り切った関係ですから。

data.title: Warikitta Kankei desukara.
data.title_japanese: 割り切った関係ですから。
data.synopsis: Kaburagi Aya, a highschool student who doesn't feel fit in with her highschool life, and Kurosaki Sei, a teacher who was oppressed by the trauma from the past, knowing each other by matching App. With ulterior motives from both side, the relationship between them has been distorted gradually...

data.title: Scramble☆Star
data.title_japanese: スクランブル☆スター
data.synopsis: Kana Kanzaki's younger brother, Kanata Kanzaki, is the lead of the new idol group, RUSH. On the day of their initial debut, he went missing and Kana was asked to take his spot...?

data.title: Heibon naru Koutei
data.title_japanese: 平凡なる皇帝
data.synopsis:
Haru is a completely average girl working as a maid in her lord's mansion, but everything changes when she finds out that she is next in line to become the empress of Dranias, a kingdom of dragons.

[Written by Denji]

titles.title: Kako no Anata wo Yuukai Shimashita
過去のあなたを誘拐しました

data.title: Kako no Anata wo Yuukai Shimashita
data.title_japanese: 過去のあなたを誘拐しました

titles.title: 世界征服!! シュリンプキングダム

data.title: Sekai Seifuku!! Shrimp Kingdom
data.title_japanese: 世界征服!! シュリンプキングダム

data.title: Nano Hazard
data.title_japanese: ナノハザード
data.synopsis:
Enjou Shuuto's dream was always to become a detective and take down the scumbag who killed his father. As practice, he takes on the local bullies at every opportunity... only to get his butt handed to him. But what happens when rogue nanobots descend on his neighborhood, "enhancing" their hosts with deadly results?

(Source: MANGA Plus)
data.background: Nano Hazard was simulpub in English through MANGA Plus service.

data.title: Psycho Against
data.title_japanese: サイコアゲンスト
data.synopsis:
In the year 2045, some humans known as "Seconds" have evolved to another level. Leon Kurosaki, a doctor whose daughter was killed by a Second, gains even stronger powers while seeking his revenge.

(Source: Shueisha, translated)

data.title: Gannibal
data.title_japanese: ガンニバル
data.synopsis:
When a police officer is posted to a remote village in the countryside, little does he realize he's encroaching on a community of a cannibals...

(Source: MU)
data.background: Gannibal has been published in French by Meian since July 29, 2020, and in English by Ablaze. The series has been adapted into a live-action TV series since December 28, 2022.

data.title: Kono Saki, Dobunuma Chuui
data.title_japanese: この先、どぶ沼注意
data.synopsis:
Everyone in town knows not to get involved with Dobunuma Seiichirou. But what they don't know is that he has the ability to stop time for 5 seconds.

[Written by Denji]

data.title: Online no Hitsuji-tachi
data.title_japanese: オンラインの羊たち
data.synopsis: The year is 1999. In a rural town in Japan, three middle school students' lives are changed after they gain access to the World Wide Web for the very first time.

data.title: Yasashii Hikari
data.title_japanese: やさしいヒカリ
data.synopsis:
"Maybe, if I were to live faraway..."

Miyake, a salaryman who had been living his life without a break, arrives for a new job on Tsukinowa island, where time flows gently. With a high school girl, Hiyoko, as his guide, a new life will begin!

(Source: Kodansha, translated)

titles.title: Why Raeliana Ended Up at the Duke's Mansion
Why She Had to Go to the Duke
The Reason Why Raeliana Ended up at the Duke's Mansion
Why Raeliana Ended Up at the Duke's Mansion

data.title: Why Raeliana Ended Up at the Duke's Mansion
data.title_english: Why Raeliana Ended Up at the Duke's Mansion
data.title_japanese: 그녀가 공작저로 가야 했던 사정
title_synonyms: Why She Had to Go to the Duke
The Reason Why Raeliana Ended up at the Duke's Mansion
data.synopsis:
When Park Eunha dies in modern-day Korea, she awakens in the body of Raeliana McMillan, the eldest daughter of a nouveaux riche baron. However, this is no ordinary world; it's the exact same one as a novel she once read. Beloved by her family, it would seem as though she is in a fairy tale. But Raeliana is far from the main character—she is a mere plot device, whose murder at the hands of her fiancé instigates the entire story. 

Raeliana has no intention to accept her fate quietly. She sets her eyes on someone in a position of great power—the vieux riche male protagonist Duke Noah Volstaire Wynknight—aiming to completely change the original story. Using her knowledge of future events, Raeliana offers information to Noah on the condition that he acts as her fake fiancé, but the Duke's two-faced nature throws a wrench in her plans!

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
data.background: Why Raeliana Ended Up at the Duke's Mansion has been published digitally in English as The Reason Why Raeliana Ended up at the Duke's Mansion by TappyToon since November 2, 2018. The volumes have been published in English as Why Raeliana Ended Up at the Duke's Mansion by Yen Press since June 28, 2022.

data.title: Isekai Rakugo
data.title_japanese: 異世界落語
data.synopsis:
In a world on the verge of destruction from invading demons, the kingdom of Saitopia uses summoning magic to summon a savior from another world. However, they accidentally summon Rakurakutei Ippuku, a rakugo performer.

[Written by Denji]

titles.title: Goblin Slayer Gaiden 2: Tsubanari no Daikatana
Goblin Slayer Gaiden 2: Tsubanari no Tachi
ゴブリンスレイヤー外伝2 鍔鳴の太刀《ダイ・カタナ》

data.title: Goblin Slayer Gaiden 2: Tsubanari no Daikatana
data.title_japanese: ゴブリンスレイヤー外伝2 鍔鳴の太刀《ダイ・カタナ》
title_synonyms: Goblin Slayer Gaiden 2: Tsubanari no Tachi
data.synopsis: Tells the story of Sword Maiden from years ago, when she was an adventurer herself, in a party composed of a mysterious Samurai, his older sister who is a magic wielder, a scout Rhea and more to discover.

titles.title: Yuusha no Party ni Eiyoushi ga Kuwawatta!
勇者のパーティーに栄養士が加わった!

data.title: Yuusha no Party ni Eiyoushi ga Kuwawatta!
data.title_japanese: 勇者のパーティーに栄養士が加わった!
data.synopsis:
The hero Kavin is on a quest to save the princess from an incurable illness, but his stomach problems are dragging his party down. After a particularly bad case of the runs, he meets a woman named Hanae at a restaurant, who is very knowledgeable about nutrition, and helps him have a light meal that won't upset his stomach. Moved by this, Kavin immediately decides to add Harue to their party to make sure they're all eating properly.

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

titles.title: Monster ga Afureru Sekai ni Natta node, Suki ni Ikitai to Omoimasu
モンスターがあふれる世界になったので、好きに生きたいと思います
The World Is Full of Monsters Now, Therefore I Want to Live as I Wish.

data.title: Monster ga Afureru Sekai ni Natta node, Suki ni Ikitai to Omoimasu
data.title_english: The World Is Full of Monsters Now, Therefore I Want to Live as I Wish.
data.title_japanese: モンスターがあふれる世界になったので、好きに生きたいと思います
data.synopsis:
On his way home from his office, the main protagonist drove and ran over a big dog. At that moment, he suddenly heard a voice inside his head. "The monster has been defeated, you have gained experience points." "Eh?" Before anyone knew, the world had changed. Monsters appear, this is a game-like world where levels, skills, and status exist. This is an adventure where the modern world becomes fantasy and where the main protagonist has to strive hard for his survival.

(Source: Shousetsuka ni Narou, translated)

titles.title: Monster ga Afureru Sekai ni Natta node, Suki ni Ikitai to Omoimasu
The World Is Overflowing with Monster
I'm Taking a Liking to This Life
The world is full of monsters now
therefore I want to live as I wish.
モンスターがあふれる世界になったので、好きに生きたいと思います
The World is Full of Monsters, So I Want to Live as I Wish

data.title: Monster ga Afureru Sekai ni Natta node, Suki ni Ikitai to Omoimasu
data.title_english: The World is Full of Monsters, So I Want to Live as I Wish
data.title_japanese: モンスターがあふれる世界になったので、好きに生きたいと思います
title_synonyms: The World Is Overflowing with Monster
I'm Taking a Liking to This Life
The world is full of monsters now
therefore I want to live as I wish.
data.synopsis:
"You have acquired experience points. Kazuto Kudou has risen to Level 1," echoes through Kazuto's mind after he runs over a mysterious dog on his way home from work. The next morning, he awakens to a changed world, full of vicious monsters. The world now features a game-like system of levels and skills, alongside danger at every turn. Will Kazuto be able to survive by leveling up and taking advantage of the special skill he acquired the previous night? His survival adventure begins now!

(Source: Square Enix)
data.background: Monster ga Afureru Sekai ni Natta node, Suki ni Ikitai to Omoimasu has been published digitally in English as The World is Full of Monsters, So I Want to Live as I Wish by Square Enix through Manga UP!

titles.title: Kuro Ouji no Iinari ni Naranai!
黒王子の言いなりにならない!

data.title: Kuro Ouji no Iinari ni Naranai!
data.title_japanese: 黒王子の言いなりにならない!
data.synopsis:
Makoto Hime, nicknamed "the prince"—who aspires to be like the hero in a shoujo manga—is one of the most popular people in his school. However, when Arata Ouji transfers to his school, things change completely. It's because Ouji treats Hime like a princess! Although he wants to become the hero, Hime has his face lifted by the chin, is pinned to the wall, and carried bridal style... everything that happens to him is just like in a shoujo manga! To top it all off, he is exposed as a virgin and is no match for Ouji in sex techniques either! The ex-prince’s frustrations never cease in this slapstick romantic comedy.

(Source: Fusion Product, translated)

Included one-shots: Shouten Doutei Boy, Othello

Note: Chapter 1 is collected in Ore ni Hirefuse, chapter 2 is collected in Ore ni Totsuge, and Shouten Doutei Boy is collected in Kukkiri Lovers.

data.title: Tsukumogami Pompom
data.title_japanese: つくも神ポンポン
data.synopsis:
The heir to Opera Handicrafts is the good-for-nothing, doesn't-wanna-work Seinosuke. He spends his days procrastinating on the tedious jobs around the shop and falling in love with the girl who works at the café next door, Sayo-chan. But when the store's mascot Pompom comes to life, things begin to change...!

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

data.title: Saigo no Saiyuuki
data.title_japanese: 最後の西遊記
data.synopsis:
Ryuunosuke Fujita would like nothing more than a fun, carefree life with his friends. But life doesn't always go how you want it. When the third-grader arrives home one day, his father introduces him to Koharu Mori, a young wheelchair-bound girl with prosthetic limbs who from now on will be Ryuunosuke's younger sister. For Ryuunosuke, this means that he must care for her at every moment and will have no time for himself. Though sympathetic to Koharu's situation, Ryuunosuke comes to resent her and the responsibility that threatens to rob him of his youth.

However, Ryuunosuke soon finds his mundane reality replaced by fantasy. When he finds Koharu floating in the air one night, a nightmarish creature from his imagination suddenly attacks them. After his father dispatches the monster, he reveals that Koharu is actually a divine being; her very presence can materialize the monsters that come from the innate fears of others—a power so great that it could lead to the end of the world if used in the wrong hands. With the help of Toukaishuu, an alliance dedicated to dispatching monsters, Ryuunosuke vows to protect Koharu and fight against those who intend to use her abilities for evil.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

Included one-shot:
Volume 3: Momo Monogatari: Toshiharu to Tomodachi-hen
data.background: Saigo no Saiyuuki was simulpub in English as The Last Saiyuki through MANGA Plus service.
